amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds by the Office of Personnel Management to administer the multi-state plan program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 84 printed in House Report 115-830 to prohibit Federal Funds from being used by the Office of Personnel Management to administer the Multi-State Plan program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meadows amendment (A078) Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 192 (Roll no. 360).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A078) offered by Mr. Meadows.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Meadows amendment (A078) Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 192 (Roll no. 360).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
